metadata.name: Connection
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection
metadata.description: as well as expose the API calls.

metadata.name: project
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#project
metadata.description: Returns the value of attribute project

metadata.name: project=
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#project=
metadata.description: Sets the attribute project

params.name: value
params.description: the value to set the attribute project to.

metadata.name: credentials
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#credentials
metadata.description: Returns the value of attribute credentials

metadata.name: credentials=
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#credentials=
metadata.description: Sets the attribute credentials

params.name: value
params.description: the value to set the attribute credentials to.

metadata.name: initialize
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#initialize
metadata.description: Creates a new Connection instance.

metadata.name: get_topic
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#get_topic
metadata.description: Gets the configuration of a topic. Since the topic only has the name attribute, this method is only useful to check the existence of a topic. If other attributes are added in the future, they will be returned here.

metadata.name: create_topic
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#create_topic
metadata.description: Creates the given topic with the given name.

metadata.name: list_topics
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#list_topics
metadata.description: Lists matching topics.

metadata.name: delete_topic
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#delete_topic
metadata.description: Deletes the topic with the given name. All subscriptions to this topic are also deleted. Returns NOT_FOUND if the topic does not exist. After a topic is deleted, a new topic may be created with the same name.

metadata.name: create_subscription
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#create_subscription
metadata.description: Creates a subscription on a given topic for a given subscriber.

metadata.name: get_subscription
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#get_subscription
metadata.description: Gets the details of a subscription.

metadata.name: list_subscriptions
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#list_subscriptions
metadata.description: Lists matching subscriptions by project.

metadata.name: list_topics_subscriptions
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#list_topics_subscriptions
metadata.description: Lists matching subscriptions by project and topic.

metadata.name: delete_subscription
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#delete_subscription
metadata.description: Deletes an existing subscription. All pending messages in the subscription are immediately dropped.

metadata.name: publish
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#publish
metadata.description: Adds one or more messages to the topic. Returns NOT_FOUND if the topic does not exist. The messages parameter is an array of arrays. The first element is the data, second is attributes hash.

metadata.name: pull
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#pull
metadata.description: Pulls a single message from the server.

metadata.name: acknowledge
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#acknowledge
metadata.description: Acknowledges receipt of a message.

metadata.name: modify_push_config
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#modify_push_config
metadata.description: Modifies the PushConfig for a specified subscription.

metadata.name: modify_ack_deadline
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Connection#modify_ack_deadline
metadata.description: Modifies the ack deadline for a specific message.
